formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Depth of Field (DoF) is calculated using the formula: \( DoF = \frac{2 \cdot N \cdot C \cdot H \cdot f^2}{f^2 - N \cdot C \cdot H} \)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
